title: Elven boots/ko
data:
| \[   [![Combat boots.png](/images/1/15/Combat_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Combat_boots.png) [![Jungle boots.png](/images/f/fc/Jungle_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Jungle_boots.png) [![Hiking boots.png](/images/b/bc/Hiking_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Hiking_boots.png) [![Mud boots.png](/images/d/de/Mud_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Mud_boots.png) [![Buckled boots.png](/images/5/59/Buckled_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Buckled_boots.png) [![Riding boots.png](/images/4/42/Riding_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_boots.png) [![Snow boots.png](/images/f/fe/Snow_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Snow_boots.png)***elven boots |                                                               |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                               |
| Slot                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [boots](/wiki/Boots "Boots")                                  |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [1](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                          |
| Special                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | 8 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                               |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [15](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather")                            |

**엘프제 신발**은 착용자에게 [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")를 제공하는 [신발](/wiki/Boots "Boots")입니다.

## 전략

- *Main article: [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")*

엘프제 망토는 플레이어가 만날수 있는 [소코반](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") [zoo](/wiki/Zoo "Zoo")와 다른 [특별한 방](/wiki/Special_room "Special room")에서 유용한 stealth 수단이 될수 있습니다.

엘프제 신발, along with [elven cloaks](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak"), are among the lightest and most common [magical armor](/wiki/Magical_armor "Magical armor"), 이것은 [폴리파일링](/wiki/Polypiling "Polypiling")을 이상적으로 만들어 줍니다, +7까지 안전하게 강화될 수 있는 능력 때문에 더욱 그렇다.

## 메시지

- "You walk very quietly."

  You put on elven boots, and didn't already have [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"). (신발은 [자동 감정됩니다](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify").)

- "You sure are noisy."

  You removed your elven boots, and didn't have any other source of [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"). (신발은 [자동 감정됩니다](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify").)

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.](/images/3/37/Nh364-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.4](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.4 "NetHack 3.6.4"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Elven boots/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Elven boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[         
elven boots
Appearance random
Slot boots
AC 1
Special
  • stealth
Base price 8 zm
Weight 15
Material leather

엘프제 신발은 착용자에게 stealth를 제공하는 신발입니다.

전략

Main article: stealth

엘프제 망토는 플레이어가 만날수 있는 소코반 zoo와 다른 특별한 방에서 유용한 stealth 수단이 될수 있습니다.

엘프제 신발, along with elven cloaks, are among the lightest and most common magical armor, 이것은 폴리파일링을 이상적으로 만들어 줍니다, +7까지 안전하게 강화될 수 있는 능력 때문에 더욱 그렇다.

메시지

"You walk very quietly."
You put on elven boots, and didn't already have stealth. (신발은 자동 감정됩니다.)
"You sure are noisy."
You removed your elven boots, and didn't have any other source of stealth. (신발은 자동 감정됩니다.)

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.4. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
